results.title: Metformin Associated Lactic Acidosis in the Intensive Care Unit: A Rare Condition Mimicking Sepsis
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-associated @<m>DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@MALA@@@) is a rare but serious complication of @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use, associated with high mortality.
